column5: Just a heads up for those of you who ice fish be careful out there on Simcoe seems they are even cancelling a charity tournament due to safety concerns. Here's a link to the story  http://www.thestar.com/news/gta/2016/03/03/ice-fishing-charity-event-perchin-for-ms-cancelled-replaced-with-raffle.html  Kawartha Kev
Better safe than sorry for sure!
Good Stuff Kevin  Thanks  ID1  www.perchinforms.com
